summary: This is an email from attorney Marc A. Weinstein to Andrew Tomback, responding to a grand jury subpoena request for documents related to prior trusts referenced in Jeffrey Epstein's wills. The email attaches production sets of documents (Bates numbered) and indicates further documents will follow.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: Attorney sending documents in response to a grand jury subpoena related to the estate of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.role: Recipient of the email, likely an attorney or legal representative
persons.context: Recipient of the email and the grand jury subpoena response; email address is at whitecase.com.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased individual whose estate is subject to the grand jury subpoena
persons.context: The grand jury subpoena is directed to the executors of his estate regarding prior trusts referenced in his wills.

connections.description: Weinstein is communicating with Tomback regarding a legal matter (grand jury subpoena response).
Weinstein appears to be acting on behalf of or in relation to the estate of Jeffrey Epstein in responding to the grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Grand jury subpoena response email
events.description: Marc A. Weinstein sends an email to Andrew Tomback with attached documents in response to a grand jury subpoena regarding Jeffrey Epstein's prior trusts.

events.title: Production of prior wills
events.description: Prior wills of Jeffrey Epstein were produced, leading to a further request for documents related to prior trusts.

events.title: Grand jury subpoenas issued
events.description: Grand jury subpoenas were issued to the executors of the estate of Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: One Battery Park Plaza, 17th floor, New York, NY 10004-1482 (Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP office)
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued on October 18, 2019, to the executors of Jeffrey Epstein's estate.
Documents related to prior trusts referenced in Epstein's wills were requested and produced via email on January 24, 2020.
The email indicates an ongoing grand jury investigation into Epstein's estate and financial arrangements after his death.
The production includes Bates numbered documents GL000198 through GL000332, split into two zip files.
The correspondence is between legal professionals (Marc A. Weinstein and Andrew Tomback) regarding compliance with the subpoena.
